dict.acceptation: 频繁地，屡次地；往往；动；动辄；

sent.orig: Lightning fires occur frequently when lightning storms, especially dry lightning storms happen in frequently burned area.
sent.trans: 雷暴，尤其是干雷暴的出现时，遇到森林火灾多发地区，雷击火常常也多。

sent.orig: How frequently has he had such attacks?
The following are the answers to some of the most frequently asked questions about Fort McMurray.
sent.trans: 以下是对有关麦克默里堡最经常问的一些问题的答案。

sent.orig: The Variants of Incoterms2000 frequently occur in the international commercial intercourse.
sent.trans: 在国际商事交往中经常发生Incoterms2000的变体。

sent.orig: For example, economists frequently make simplifying assumptions about mathematical form.
sent.trans: 比如说，经济学家们常常对数据形式作出单一化的推测。
